title: Video Analysis Training Program for Enhancing Prospective Teachers' Professional Vision Skills

context.prior_knowledge: Basic knowledge of mathematics curriculum and foundational understanding of teaching-learning theories
context.additional_context: Parallel implementation of real-time feedback and asynchronous learning activities using digital devices (tablets/laptops)

learning_goals: Analyze small-group class videos to identify core teaching behaviors (question types, feedback methods) with 80% accuracy
Describe events occurring in class videos from three perspectives (student responses, teacher strategies, environmental factors) with signaling cues support
Write educational interpretations (cognitive aspects, strategies, improvement points) of observed behaviors in class situations within 500 characters using self-explanation prompts
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
